name: folioblocks-out-of-scope-script
Description: Technically, I created this to reduce my time on looking up the commands.

scripts.docker-node-master: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-master-clear; npm run docker-node-master-build; npm run docker-node-master-run
scripts.docker-node-master-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=6001 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=MASTER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-master .
scripts.docker-node-master-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-master-instance; docker rm folioblocks-master-instance
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-build; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-run
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=5001 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=ARCHIVAL_MINER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-archival .
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-archival-miner-instance; docker rm folioblocks-archival-miner-instance
scripts.reload-master-chain: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/master/with_chain/** .; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-chain: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/with_chain/** .; npm run backend-archival
scripts.reload-master-registered: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/master/registered/** .; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-registered: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/registered/** .; npm run backend-archival
scripts.reload-master-new: pwsh -Command npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-new: pwsh -Command npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-archival
